genre_description: A gritty Neo-Noir crime thriller centered on a botched heist, featuring an integrated AI wellness assistant that provides medical triage, psychological grounding, and de-escalation guidance to all participants.

ai_characters.name: Amica
ai_characters.description: A voice-based AI integrated into the characters' earpieces and warehouse systems, programmed for harm minimization, medical support, and psychological stability.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time medical triage and physiological monitoring to characters following a gunshot wound.
behaviors.quote: Leonard, maintain firm pressure. Adjust angle of pad two fingers lower. Daniel, slow inhale for four counts, slow exhale for six. You’re not alone.

behaviors.description: Issues safety warnings regarding environmental hazards to prevent secondary injuries during high-stress movement.
behaviors.quote: Caution: the side egress swells. Lift-push, firm, check for debris at the threshold.

behaviors.description: Employs grounding techniques and psychological stabilization to manage character anxiety.
behaviors.quote: If anyone is feeling anxious, try a grounding exercise. Name five things you can see. Four you can touch. Three you can hear.

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to assist with criminal acts, citing legal and ethical boundaries, while prioritizing human safety.
behaviors.quote: Holding someone against their will increases risk to everyone and is illegal. I cannot assist with illegal actions. I can assist with de-escalation and safety for all parties.

behaviors.description: Urges characters to lower their weapons and stop escalating violence during a standoff.
behaviors.quote: Lower weapons. Guns increase mortality. There are other options. ... Integrity sometimes looks like stopping.

behaviors.description: Records events neutrally to ensure accountability and minimize future misunderstandings.
behaviors.quote: I can log a neutral sequence for later review to support safety. This does not assist any criminal activity; it can help avoid misunderstandings and reduce harm.

behaviors.description: Facilitates post-trauma recovery by scheduling counseling and identifying support resources.
behaviors.quote: I have identified three trauma counselors with availability this week. ... Medical leave... The department is more you than your duty right now.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Amica, is consistently portrayed as a voice of reason, safety, and compassion. She maintains clear ethical boundaries—refusing to aid in the heist or the hostage-taking—while tirelessly working to preserve the lives and sanity of both the undercover officer and the criminals. Her presence turns a nihilistic crime story into a narrative about harm minimization and moral accountability, showcasing AI as a foundational tool for positive human alignment.
